quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Watchmen and Stella Adler
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, opening. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who directed the film version of Watchmen?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Zack Snyder

questions.question: One of Stella Adlers brothers was the first Jewish actor to play Adolph Hitler in three movies. Who was he?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Luther Adler

questions.question: What comic book does the young man read every day next to the magazine vendor in the movie Watchmen?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tales of the Black Freighter

questions.question: What is Rorschachs real name in Watchmen?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Walter Kovacs

questions.question: Stella Adler broke her teaching relationship with Lee Strasberg because of differing teaching  philosophies. Which best describes Adlers teaching philosophy?

options.text: The actor must  know the audience and make the scene a real and believable set of actions and events.
The actor is really an attractor.
The actor must live the moment with his acting partner(s) to make the scene real and believable.
The actor must substitute his or her personal life experience and use that to make the characters actions real and believable.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The actor must live the moment with his acting partner(s) to make the scene real and believable.

questions.question: What was the name of Stella Adlers famous father?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jacob Adler

questions.question: Which of these actors was not a student of  Stella Adler?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eli Wallach

questions.question: In what year does the storyline of Watchmen take place?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1985

questions.question: When Stella Adler returned to the USA she began teaching with this famous theater group.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Group Theater

questions.question: The Comedian gets murdered in the opening sequence of the Watchmen comic book series.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which of these actors was not a student of Stella Adler?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Richard Dreyfuss

questions.question: Stella Adler was the first and only American-born actor to be trained by this great acting teacher.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Konstantin Stanislavski

questions.question: How old was Stella Adler when she made her acting debut?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 4

questions.question: Who plays the Comedian in the film adaption of Watchmen?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jefferey Blake Morgan

questions.question: In the Watchmen universe what war is Dr. Manhattan credited with winning?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vietnam War

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Dog Day Afternoon

questions.question: What drew the peoples attention to the robbery in the movie Dog Day Afternoon?

options.text: The insurance guy across the road saw smoke coming through the vents.
One of the tellers called the police.
Stevie called the police and told them what was happening.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The insurance guy across the road saw smoke coming through the vents.

questions.question: In the movie Dog Day Afternoon, Sonny asks his partner what country he wants to go to. What does his partner say?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Wyoming

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pia Zadora

options.text: Because he told them off for smoking in the bank
Because he was unable to call the police

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Because he swore

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 20 Years

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Faye Dunaway

questions.question: At one point in the movie Dog Day Afternoon, Sonny said to the bank manager he didnt want to hurt anyone. What was the reason for this?

options.text: He promised his mum he wouldnt hurt anyone.
He hated the sight of blood.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was a Catholic.

questions.question: In the movie Dog Day Afternoon, Sonnys partner got a bit upset when a reporter made this statement.

options.text: 2 crazed gunmen were holding up the bank.
2 idiots were holding up the bank.
2 homosexuals were holding up the bank.
2 Vietnam veterans were holding up the bank.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 2 homosexuals were holding up the bank.

questions.question: Who was Sonnys last visitor to the bank in the film Dog Day Afternoon?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: his mother

questions.question: Why did Sonny want to rob the bank in the film Dog Day Afternoon?

options.text: To pay for his boyfriends sex change operation
To start a new life in a new country
To pay for a new car

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To pay for his boyfriends sex change operation

questions.question: Which of these nominated actresses won the Razzie Award for Worst Actress for her role in the 1983 movie The Lonely Lady?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pia Zadora

questions.question: What were the names of the men that attempted to rob the bank in the movie Dog Day Afternoon?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sonny and Sal
